statements: SELECT * FROM merchant_info;
SELECT merchant_id, merchant_name FROM merchant_info;
SELECT location, description FROM merchant_info;
SELECT * FROM merchant_info WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT merchant_name, location FROM merchant_info WHERE merchant_id = 2;
SELECT merchant_name, location FROM merchant_info WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM merchant_info WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT merchant_name, description FROM merchant_info WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%Mart%';
SELECT * FROM merchant_info ORDER BY merchant_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM merchant_info WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM MerchantInfo;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM MerchantInfo ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM TransactionDetails WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TransactionDetails WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT merchant_name, sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM MerchantInfo JOIN TransactionDetails ON MerchantInfo.merchant_id = TransactionDetails.merchant_id GROUP BY merchant_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM MerchantInfo WHERE merchant_location = 'New York';
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM MerchantInfo ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionDetails WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM TransactionDetails;
SELECT merchant_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM MerchantInfo JOIN TransactionDetails ON MerchantInfo.merchant_id = TransactionDetails.merchant_id GROUP BY merchant_name;
